website_summaries.verdict: If comfort and versatility is a top priority for you, then give these Depth Charge - Flish shoes from the Skechers brand a try. The sneakers provide enough cushioning against hard concrete floors and will keep your feet happy despite long hours of standing up or walking. They’re so comfy that you can also use them for relaxing at home in place of slippers.Skechers slip-ons are always ready to go whenever you are, and these are no different. These slip-ons contain grippy soles that provide enough traction on different surfaces.
pros: Skechers Depth Charge - Flish sneakers are found to be comfy by most reviewers, with one of them saying these feel like upgraded slippers
Several people like how lightweight these slip-ons are
Some users say that Skechers Depth Charge - Flish loafers provide an excellent fit
A few individuals have indicated how pleased they are that the shoes come in wide widths too
The sneakers are true to size
These are quite grippy, some consumers have noted
According to a handful of testers, Skechers Depth Charge - Flish slip-ons are easy to put on and off
The low-top shoes can be versatile, a small number of customers say, because they can be used at home as slippers or outside for work or lifestyle use
The price is friendly on the pocket, one person has stated
cons: The low-top Skechers shoes only come in a few dark, neutral colors

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a wide shoe and I didn't think that I would ever wear a loafer type shoe again, but for the price I thought I would give these a try. They turned out to be the perfect shoe for me. They are light weight and I forget what I am wearing until someone mentions that they like the shoes I'm wearing or I start to take them off and remember that I didn't have to break them in, they were comfortable from the first step.
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick F Skill

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very well built - for the price - and has an excellent fit. I got the wider one and it is so comfortable that I cannot adequately describe it. Also very light and well cushioned. Feather light as well1 Highly recommend. Two years ago I bout an earlier version - do not remember name, but looked very similar, at Costco - and this one is sturdier and better.
customer_reviews.author: S. M.

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable daily shoe
customer_reviews.text: Per hubby: this shoe isn’t great-looking but it’s the most comfortable thing I have ever put on. I liked the more modern style. It definitely gives you a good inch of lift, so you will be taller in this shoe. He has fatter feet so we put a couple of cans in the shoes overnight to stretch the elastic more, word to the wise.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S

customer_reviews.title: True-to-size fit, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Easy on and off without sacrificing looks. Really great to keep at work since I ride my motorcycle (with full motorcycle boots) every work day. It's easy to take off the moto boots and slip these on in a flash. Same deal when suiting up to go home. True to size, super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Burke

customer_reviews.title: Clouds for your feet
customer_reviews.text: I doubt you will ever wear a more comfortable shoe than these. Wow are they a God send for my aching dogs. I wear them non stop around the house and anywhere I can to comfort my feet. I wish the soles weren't white, but the benefits are worth the loudness. hahaha
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Smooth shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, shoe is light, looks really great with jeans, "smooth" is the closest word I could come up with to describe wearing and walking in these shoes! Very, very comfortable! If I can find the same shoe in black I will buy it as well!
customer_reviews.author: oibv305

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, comfy build. Good for structured walking schedule. We'll see just how long they last. I wore out a similar shoe from Sketchers in less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Upper Left Coast

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very versatile. It is as comfortable as the best "sneakers" for walking long distances yet a bit dressier.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce R. Shames

customer_reviews.title: Love these Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are comfortable, and my feet are very happy! The color is actually better than the picture: very vivid. You will not be disappointed with these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Arnold E. Berrier

customer_reviews.title: Fiat was as expected and this is the most comfortable pair of shoes I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Fiat was as expected and this is the most comfortable pair of shoes I have ever had. Bought a second pair as soon as I tried this one. The memory foam insole seems to be the secret
customer_reviews.author: Potter O.

customer_reviews.title: They are ok size wise, but if you are ...
customer_reviews.text: They are ok size wise, but if you are expecting wide shoes at a 2E they are not very wide...otherwise a decent knock-around shoe
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shoe it is very light-weight and comfortable. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: CCC

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe solves problem
customer_reviews.text: I was having foot problems until I tried these sketchers. They fit just right and my problem is gone.
customer_reviews.author: easy critic

customer_reviews.title: Totally wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a men's shoe - received a women's shoe. I ordered a size 9W - received 7.5. The only thing correct was the color. I don't know who filled the order, but they did not do their job very well.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes, just a bit narrow close to heel.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes, but my son said they felt too narrow/tight near the heel. We returned them and ordered a Wide width.
customer_reviews.author: denise blount

customer_reviews.title: Wide enough
customer_reviews.text: I have an extra wide foot and these fit fine. Comfy
customer_reviews.author: Aloha

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: It's just a casual shoe but gives exceptional support. More than other Skecher shoes that I have. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ron D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable ... as many Sketchers with memory foam are !
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a pair of these months ago for some ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a pair of these months ago for some reason this pair was to tight .I got the same size as last time. strange
customer_reviews.author: Chas B

customer_reviews.title: A touch narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes only wish I would of gotten them in a wide size, they're a bit narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Richard  D. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for day to day activities
customer_reviews.text: The best lofer I had since years. I am wearing it everyday
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these for a week. They are comfortable and they look pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Comfort !
customer_reviews.text: Great comfort, accurate size. Terrific value for the price. Can’t say enough , totally satisfied .
customer_reviews.author: jerry aimette

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for summer
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, nice fit, doesn’t slip when walking, stylish enough for summer dress up.
customer_reviews.author: ctauto

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for diabetic
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on for a diabetic. Wide width without slippage. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: maf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, comfortable from the first moment and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: advertised as a "slip on" but too tight to slip on
customer_reviews.text: Shoes too difficult for man to "slip on" as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Mari Lyn Potter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are extremely comfortable, the memory foam insoles are great. Nothing to say negative. And they fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Dohman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really love the shoes. Very fast shipping. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love shoes,very comfortable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 10m cause all my other Skechers are size 10 and it was alittle tight,so returned and got a 10.5m and it’s so much better.very comfortable!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Rispoli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect comfort
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, so comfortable. Wish they had more variety of colors. My size in the other colors are never in stock. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Nwauntie

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Depth Charge Flish Loafer,
product_meta.description: A casual walking shoe that's sure to please. The SKECHERS® Depth Charge - Flish! Woven mesh fabric and smooth synthetic uppers. Easy slip-on style with dual stretch gore for flex. Soft fabric shoe lining. Nearly seamless fabric upper for added comfort and sleek look. Smooth synthetic overlay heel panel. Socklike continuous collar for smooth comfort. Air Cooled Memory Foam cushioned comfort insole. Depth Charge design midsole with superior impact cushioning protection and remarkable energy return. Flexible lightweight midsole with embossed midsole line design. One-piece design midsole for lightweight durable comfort. Flexible grippy traction outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 10 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11, width EE - Wide. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
